name: 100 Days Of Code Journal Dashboard
description: Boost Your Coding Skills with "The 100 Days Of Code Journal"Are you considering doing the #100DaysOfCode challenge? I designed this vibrant Notion dashboard to help you stay consistent with the challenge. It's a space to journal your progress, set a clear 100-day goal and reflect on your daily achievements all in one place.You will love this dashboard if: You are ready to commit to coding for at least an hour every day You want a structured way to journal your learning with meaningful journal pr
features: You are ready to commit to coding for at least an hour every day; You want a structured way to journal your learning with meaningful journal prompts
